title: Making our 'Grading' counts in Ranked Results
body: I would like to suggest using our end game 'Grading' to add a few league points in ranked games. For example, Achieving 'A' to 'S+' will add 1-4 league pts to our ranked game regardless of win or loss. I believe this system can restore some justice to players who did well in a game but loss because of bad team mates, DC, AFk etc. In the situation when players who are on '0' points, this system will gave them one more chance to stay in that tier which they deservedly so if they have done so well in that last game.
